pkgmetadata.longdescription: AI Assistant to Write and Understand R Code // An R console utility that lets you ask R related questions to the 'OpenAI' large language model. It can answer 'how-to()' questions by providing code, and 'whatis()' questions by explaining what given code does. You must provision your own key for the 'OpenAI' API https://platform.openai.com/docs/api-reference.
